name: Hell Gill
description:
Introduction

Short slot canyon. No real height descended. Can be easily ascended. No rope required. Steepest section is bolted. Largest drop can be jumped.

Approach

Canyon lies in the copse of trees above the farm. (upstream of Hell Gill Force)

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background
